com.tchristofferson.pagedinventories

Class InventoryRegistrar

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tchristofferson.pagedinventories.InventoryRegistrar

  • public class InventoryRegistrar
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a registrar for open PagedInventories

                     IPagedInventory pagedInventory,
                     org.bukkit.inventory.Inventory inventory)

        Parameters:

      • getOpenInventories
